title: Donald Trump 又出手，趕絕網上冒牌貨   等中國逆賊連少少美金都R吾到

replies.msg:
https://www.reuters.com/article/us-usa-trump-shipments/trump-signs-executive-order-aimed-at-preventing-sales-of-counterfeit-goods-from-overseas-idUSKBN1ZU35P

Trump signs executive order aimed at preventing sales of counterfeit goods from overseas

WASHINGTON (Reuters) - President Donald Trump signed an executive order on Friday aimed at preventing counterfeit products from abroad from being sold to U.S. citizens who shop online using Amazon.com, Walmart.com or other ecommerce websites, the White House said.

Presidential trade adviser Peter Navarro urged Amazon, Walmart and digital commerce sites to take steps to ensure that the goods they sell are safe and legal.

“If they don’t, DHS will take steps to ensure they do,” he told reporters, referring to the Department of Homeland Security.

Part of the policy was aimed at preventing narcotics, like fentanyl, from entering the United States at a time when the country is fighting widespread opioid addiction, the order said.

As part of the order, the president asked DHS to “consider appropriate measures” to ensure that companies that sell products from overseas do not ship knockoffs, which they have argued can damage the U.S. economy, cost American jobs, support criminal activity and potentially harm consumers.

https://hk.on.cc/hk/bkn/cnt/amenews/20200201/mobile/bkn-20200201083259840-0201_00972_001.html

美國特朗普政府嚴打網上賣假貨，總統特朗普周五（1月31日）簽署行政命令，要求亞馬遜、沃爾瑪等美國網購平台採取行動，防止網站售賣來自海外的山寨貨，保護美國經濟及就業。
行政命令規定，網購平台要防止販賣來自海外的假貨，國土安全部亦會確保外國公司不會運仿製品到美國，並需制訂名單列出不遵守出口禁令的外國企業名單，同時列明貨物中違禁品比例高的公司。命令亦指，今次規定是政府遏止芬太尼等毒品進入美國的一部分。
白宮國家貿易委員會主任納瓦羅促請亞馬遜、沃爾瑪及其他數碼平台，採取行動確保它們的商品是安全和合法，否則國土安全部會介入處理。美國貿易代表萊蒂澤則指，走私假貨對美國工人、消費者、知識產權及經濟造成顯著傷害。他強調，保護知識產權及打擊假貨是美國與其他國家貿易關係的優先事務，亦是《美墨加自由貿易協議》和中美首階段貿易協議的重要部分。
無咩好講...只有掌聲...
